snippet.title: ARIDA: Backland's Awakening [Official Trailer]
snippet.description:
A story of survival and adventure in the Brazilian backlands. Face the drought to explore the more arid regions, gather resources and discover clues about the fate of the young Cícera. 

Play now Arida Backland's Awakening on http://bit.ly/playarida

#ARIDA #BacklandsAwakening #AocaGameLab #PC

Like Aoca Game Lab on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/AocaGameLab
Follow us on Twitter: http://twitter.com/AocaGameLab
Follow us on Instagram: http://instagram.com/AocaGameLab
